title: The Milk Man
body:
I can't really tell you the last time I had heard this term, being 15 and living in this time period, the term isn't used as much anymore. But the time I did hear this term, I didn't want to.

About a year ago I was watching YouTube, I know, I know, a 15 year old female watching YouTube, how "creative". Anyway, I found this YouTuber, I won't say the name,(but I'm sure that you'll be able to figure it out), but I will tell you his real name later. I had found this person's channel when I was watching one of his friends playing Gmod(Garry's Mod if you didn't know), this video was posted a while back. This YouTuber, Lucas is his real name, was playing Freeze Tag with his friends and he had showed his new player model, it was a Milk Carton with arms and legs. I did, however, find this the funniest video at the time.

I was bored one day and I had decided to revisit this video, but something was odd. I was left alone and I heard something pouring and odd laughing outside. I had paused the video and the odd noise stopped. I thought that I was just hearing things, so I continued the video.

Again, there was laughter. I had decided to listen closely, and it sounded like Lucas, the man with the Milk Carton player model.

I texted my mother and I hadn't gotten any texts from her, I tried calling and everything, and nothing worked. I decided to message my friends and nothing worked. Even my cats were sound asleep. I was on my own with this one.

As I continued to watch this video, I heard more laughter, but no pouring. I did however, heard knocking on my bedroom window, I was in the living room and I could see my bedroom from where was I sitting. I decided to look over and what I saw was the most horrifying and most beautiful thing ever.

My bedroom's outside light was on and saw a beautiful man in all white, like an outfit a Milk Man would wear. This man had brunette hair with matching brown eyes.

What was creepy was his smile, it was a wide smile that looked like a sinister smile. That was only thing that was creepy, but it was also satisfying at the same time.

I had paused the video, and he stayed there, smiling. It was hypnotizing, I walked over to him feeling controlled and I stared into his brown eyes, he was so much more beautiful looking up closer.

I could hear him talking even though he was outside, I could hear him in my head, but his lips were moving. He had told me to go outside. I listened to him without thinking.

When I was outside I saw him still at my window, I walked up to him and put my hand on his face. His face was so warm. "Let's go home", he had said calmly and I walked off with him into the woods by my home.

New text from MOM:

Sent at 1:55 a.m.

-Hey sweetheart are you okay?

Sent at 2:30 a.m.

-You took your Meds today , right?

Sent at 4:30 a.m.

- Are you there?

3 Missed calls from: MOM
author: Rat_girl112
